pages.text: The $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$ will $(thing)right-click/$ the item in its first inventory slot, for every entity in the specified $(l:programming/area)Area/$, once. This could be used to shear sheep, milk cows, breed animals, and much more!$(p)Keep in mind that any $(l:programming/area)Area/$ widgets connected to this widget must have an area type of $(thing)Box/$; this is the only supported shape. It's possible to create different shapes, though, by using whitelisting/blacklisting of areas.
